content: App too old, the touch screen isnt working properly on my galaxy s 20
Their new games are a disappointment but these old ones are still awesome
Construction workers aren't doing anything. They walk to get stone then they walk back. They have stopped building anything. No explanation.

I love Kairosoft games, and I love how different each of their games are. Pyraplex is another attempt to differentiate itself from the mold, and sadly, is not the outcome doesn't create very satisfying game mechanics. You have to juggle between having a high amount of buildings to complete tasks and keeping your building pyramid-shaped. Sounds pretty interesting on paper, but construction is so slow-paced that it interferes with your planning. Overall, it's ok, but far from. their best title.
paid for this cause I got hooked in the lite version.. games amazing BUT if I pay for a game I dont want advertisements
great game
unable to play the game wont start sys it cant save , does not have acess to its save folder?
great game

It's easy to learn and get into. My only complaint is that despite this game being centered around Egypt, there's not a single brown or tan person in it. These people are as pale as can be. Other than that the game is addicting and cute with endless combos.
awesome game. Except theres a problem. You vant shift shops over if the amenity was placed there before.

switched without you even realizing

As much as I love Kairosoft games, like this one, I am going to have to give it a much lower rating than I would like. The games do nothing for me when I get those authentication errors and cannot play them. So I will not be purchasing any more. I adore this game! Another reviewer had it right when they said it's Sims meets Pharaoh in a great, pixel way!       My only issue is that I want to start fresh, and short of uninstalling and re-installing the game, I can't find a way to delete the save files. :/ A lack of a "New Game" button, but really, that's a minor ding on a beautiful game. :D

This Kairosoft title is adorable, but definitely lacks the depth they are so well-known for. The stamps get old by the third year, and there's nothing else to do. No replay value, as compared to the rest of their games.

Instead of plonking down new stores, you now have to manage between mining for blocks and carrying them to build the stores. Pests also come into the desert which you have to get rid off and there are constantly quests to fulfill. But again, like most of their recent games, one playthrough is enough to unlock most rewards. Still enough twists to make this good fun! v1.0.3, text still cut off.

Alot similar to mega mall story with little twists seemed easier than the other games but all round a great game.

Game is like Mega Mall except Egyptian. You have to quarry stone for rooms, chase snakes off, all while providing customer service. It's fun. 4 stars due to text running out of boxes. Doesn't make it unplayable by any means. But it's sloppy for a Kairosoft game or any game for that matter that costs $4.99  Let's see another Sports Sim or Game Dev Story 2!!!

Ok everyone with problem, listen. Go to setting > application > manage apps > google play store > delete data, cache I got problem here too..and doing this helped.  Taught by Angry birds staff (fixing similar prob) :) Now enjoy!
